content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron Plate Production at position (52.0, -80.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position (52.0, -80.0)) 
-  Furnace (position (62.0, -54.0))
-  Burner Inserter (position (53.5, -78.5)) that puts items into the furnace at position (52.0, -80.0)
-  Belt Group that connects the area to the furnace at position (52.0, -80.0)

### Coal Storage at position (52.5, -82.5)
Consists of a Chest (position (52.5, -82.5)) that stores iron plates


### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner inserter
-  Ensure the burner inserter has enough fuel to operate
-  Make sure the burner inserter is placed correctly to pick up and drop items

### Errors when using furnace
-  Ensure the furnace has enough fuel to operate
-  Make sure the furnace is not overfilled with fuel

### Errors when using belt group
-  Ensure the belt group is correctly connected to the furnace and other entities
-  Make sure the belt group has enough space to transport items


### NAMESPACE
-  No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
-  Important variables:
  -  `transport-belt`: int
  -  `burner-inserter`: int
  -  `burner-mining-drill`: int
  -  `wood`: int
  -  `coal`: int
  -  `stone`: int
  -  `iron-ore`: int
  -  `iron-plate`: int
